summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 10, Highland View Addition, being the alley between 19th Avenue Northwest and 20th Avenue Northwest from West 85th Street to West 87th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17515 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
